L

Listener - Interface in io.spire.api
Implements this for having objects processing messages in the background i.e.
login(String, String) - Method in class io.spire.api.Api
Authenticates an existing Spire account
login(String, String) - Method in class io.spire.Spire
Creates an authenticated Spire session using the account login and password.
longPoll(Message.MessageOptions) - Method in class io.spire.api.Subscription
Retrieve all messages since last timestamp
longPoll() - Method in class io.spire.api.Subscription
Retrieve all messages since last timestamp with default Message.MessageOptions
